name: Rock Painting Story
description:
Rock Painting Story is an action-adventure in a style and mood of an ancient times. Grand prize (~$1000) of russian indiedev forum (Hellroom) jam.

The game is pretty short to complete but have a lot of fun and a bit of drama.
If support the developer, we will make a sequel of it!

Features:
* The graphic style of cave paintings from the Stone Age.
* The story told without words. Pure emotions and music.
* The atmosphere of loneliness and antiquity.
* Hunt and fend off wild animals.
* Mammoth. In an unusual role.
* Some puzzles.
* Battles with the enemy tribe.

Have fun!
